params._owner: Address of the future proxy owner

params._priceFeeds: Array of corresponding price feed addresses
params._walletImplementation: Address of the wallet implementation contract
params._whitelistedTokens: Array of initially whitelisted token addresses

createProxy(address).details: Uses CREATE2 for deterministic address generation

params._owner: Address that will own the new wallet

returns._0: address The address of the newly created proxy
address[] memory Array of proxy addresses
uint256 The count of deployed proxies
bytes memory Raw bytes data of the owner

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setImplementationAddress(address).details: Can only be called by the owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

computeProxyAddress(address).notice: Computes the deterministic address for a proxy before deployment

constructor.notice: Initializes the factory with required addresses

createProxy(address).notice: Creates a new wallet proxy for a given owner

getProxiesCount().notice: Returns the total number of deployed proxies

getProxyOwner(address).notice: Gets the raw owner data from a proxy contract

getProxyOwnerAddress(address).notice: Gets the owner address from a proxy contract

owner().notice: Returns the owner address of the factory

setDefaultTokensAndFeeds(address[],addre.notice: Updates the default token and price feed lists

documentation.text:
@title IChatterPayWalletFactory
 @notice Interface for the ChatterPayWalletFactory contract defining core functionality

@notice Returns the owner address of the factory
 @return address The owner's address

@notice Sets the fee admin address
 @param _newFeeAdmin New fee admin address

@notice Returns all deployed proxy addresses
 @return address[] memory Array of proxy addresses

@notice Returns the total number of deployed proxies
 @return uint256 The count of deployed proxies
